ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Song (parody): Closet Male
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, all the time.  Half-elves are far and away the most popular, but any of the elven races, Erudites, and Humans have their admirers. - I love the half-elf
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, all the time. Half-elves are far and away the most popular, but any
of
the elven races, Erudites, and Humans have their admirers.

- I love the half-elf male bards :) The nice clean shaven face.... My
what a nice set of pixels you have ;) I also like the blonde barbarian.....

> Jacana, Wood Elf Bard of the 17th song, Innoruuk
- *in her best eeyor voice* "Thanks for noticing"
Oh yea thanks to Kuark and a few hours tonight a bubble off 18 :)

the female player who made a male half-elf bard so that she could ogle him
without offending other players. ;^)

- I would do that but it's more fun to have "live bait". Some days I have
WAY too much fun as a bard. My guild and I have a joke about Jacana and her
"horde of smitten followers". They are everywhere ;) I love bards!

Jacana , Wood Elf Bard, Innoruuk

P.S. Did I mention how much I love bards?



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
